com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.placeholders

Interface FullSignPlaceHolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SignPlaceHolder

    public interface FullSignPlaceHolder
extends SignPlaceHolder
    Sign placeholder that replaces the whole sign

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      net.kyori.text.Component[] apply(User user, org.bukkit.Location location, java.lang.String[] rawLines, net.kyori.text.Component[] lines, java.lang.String key)
      Applies this placeholder to the lines, can replace every line

      • apply

net.kyori.text.Component[] apply(@Nonnull

                                          net.kyori.text.Component[] lines,
                                          @Nonnull
                                          java.lang.String key)
        Applies this placeholder to the lines, can replace every line
        Parameters:
        user - the user that will receive the updated sign
        location - the location of the sign
        rawLines - the plain text content of the lines
        lines - the parsed lines
        key - the key of this placeholder
        Returns:
        the replaced lines
